actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in the State of Ohio.

summary.text: States that in order to preserve the historic and scenic features of the Ohio and Erie Canal and to develop the canal for public recreation, the Secretary of the Interior is authorized to establish the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in Ohio. Provides for the acquisition of land for such park and authorizes to be appropriated sums necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in the State of Ohio.
